Perceptor/DarkHawk/swarm bots:

Perceptor Started to track furios the maxim=
als and Autobot's signature while the inner defences started to pop out and=
 opening fire against Tucson. The inner Alarms was ranging aloud and Hydras=
 ran towars the level where Tucson and ratrap were.

the swarmbots started =
to opened their mini lasers agaisnt Ratrap, while Darkhawk, furious for wha=
t had happened, he ran behind Tucson




From: Sandy 
Sent: Friday, Februar=
y 26, 2010 10:58 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Recovering Rod=
imus/BlackFortress


  
On wheels, Tucson had a better chance of maneuverin=
g between the blasts that Scorponok was throwing out. He uses his current s=
tate to his advantage, and screches his rubber on his tires, pivoting them =
quickly to maneuver away from the blasts. He had no sonar senses to guide h=
im but he had his audo sensors and his sense of feel and touch, guiding him=
. The system that Rat Trap was now holding merely augments his audio sensor=
s and even though he could have used the device, he was now quickly getting=
 used to not having it on him. And now, he could feel Rodimus's energy sign=
ature. But first he had to get rid of Scorponok and Dark Hawk. He knew he d=
id not have enough energon in his main power core, but he did have a reserv=
e stash in his backup battery. He calculated that since he had hardly touch=
ed this backup, it had close to ninety five percent capacity, yet it had to=
 be used sparingly. This meant deciding between vehicle and robot mode. He =
makes a quick anaylasis of his systems.. Which would be able to concerve mo=
re? Vehicle or robot mode? 

The truth was, they were equal in ussage. But =
he knew he had to stick to vehicle mode, to make for a fast getaway if he d=
id indeed find a way out of there.. Meanwhile, hidden not too far now, from=
 the torture chamber, Rat Trap who has made his way into a vent hole, right=
 over the chamber, spots Tucson. He then finds another bundle of wires and =
finds readable tags on them.

"It's wheels, he's up'n runn'n.. Must be on a=
 backup battery... That might last a few hours but that's about it. Okay, t=
ime for this rat ta be his rattiest!" 

He finds a tag that leads to the ch=
amber, and begins to knaw at the wires that are connected to it. He snaps t=
hem readilly with his strong, buck teeth. The doors suddenly open in the to=
rture chamber.

"WHEELS, BURN RUBBER!"

Tucson could hear Rat Trap's voice =
and without questioning him, he spins his rear tires, creates a smoke scree=
n and senses the wind coming in from the open doors. He takes this opportun=
ity to get past Scorponok, via creating a low lying smoke cloud, cloaking h=
is chassse, and manges to get outside the chamber, stopping in front of Rod=
imus. Rat Trap continues to knaw at wires, hoping that one of them was anot=
her wire that would disable the security and weaponry systems.

Outside, Tu=
cson transforms into robot mode and in front of Rodimus. This was it,he was=
 face to face with his former leader. Rat Trap positions himself inside, at=
 a peek hole, to watch what's happening.

"Lord Elder, you wont' believe th=
is, but, Tucson got outa there, and he's face ta face with Rodimus. I sure =
hope he gives 'em his come uppn's. Lousey worthless piece of Scrap.. I hope=
 wheels drives you to the ground'n then some... "

At the Ark and shuttle a=
rea...

Quickstride looks around and focuses on the shuttle. Yet, the body =
of Optimus Prime holds his attention for a moment as he looks up to him.

"=
Wow, you must've been one heck of a leader in your days. Rat Trap says he's=
 with someone who's related to you. I wish I could do something ta help you=
 guys get back on your wheels, but I'm just a Maximal and I really don't kn=
ow how to bring your men back ta life... That Autobot out there could sure =
use your help, looks like that Rodimus guy really let you down and gave int=
o those Predacons. I really can't judge the guy because I wasn't there when=
 it happened, but from what Rat Trap says, I - dunno if I could ever respec=
t a leader who weakens under pressure. Okay, I gotta go, Lord Elder needs m=
y help. Rest in peace.

He salutes the still form of Optimus Prime and gets=
 to the shuttle. 

"Lord Elder, I've reached the shuttle and I'm now perfor=
ming preliminary take off proceedures."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Pre=
ston Carroll <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> Rodimus had been standing just =
outside the torture chamber not sure if
> he wanted to actually enter it. t=
here was something about this room
> that gave him the chills, especially w=
hen he didn't need to go in
> there.
> 
> Instead he just stood in the shad=
ows, listening the words of the
> others like Darkhawk, Scorponok and that =
Autobot Tuscon. there was
> something about that Autobot that seemed to gra=
te on his nerves. He
> wasn't sure what it was, maybe it was his high sound=
ing talk, maybe it
> was his tenacity, maybe it was his . . . .
> 
> *SLAM!=
*
> 
> Rodimus was jolted out of his revelry by the doors slamming shut,
> =
cutting him off from the torture chamber. Inside he could hear
> threatenin=
g tones coming from Scorponok and Darkhawk, and the sound of
> a vehicle's =
engine revving.
> 
> Rodimus' attention was diverted from further listening=
 as a message
> came over his comms, a text message from Perceptor.
> 
> > =
"Rodimus... Go to this sector and watch out that our enemies doesnt go insi=
de" typed Perceptor fast and send the secret message "They mustnt get her..=
. Do what ever you have to to stop them"
> 
> "Yes!" Rodimus jumped as he c=
ould see the urgency with the speed that
> Perceptor was typing the message=
. "On my way!" he sent back as he
> received the location from Perceptor.
>=
 
> Rodimus was surprised, as the location was only a short distance away.
=
> With a thought he quickly shifted into his vehicle, gunned his motor
> an=
d moved swiftly. He figured the 'her' that Perceptor was referring
> to was=
 Nightlight. Nightlight was Rodimus' wife, he would not let
> those idiot M=
aximals get their hands on her!
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
> (Dark Rodimus)
>
=
